abstract: Alexis Soloski highlights five of the best novels about the art of acting.
snippet: In addition to “Lucky Break,” here are five of the best novels about the art of acting.
lead_paragraph: In addition to “Lucky Break,” here are five of the best novels about the art of acting.

headline.main: A Profession Lands a Starring Role in Literature About the Theater
